Title: Exempts processors of syrup made from tree sap or honey from certain licensing requirements
Summary: Exempts processors of syrup made from tree sap or honey who do not purchase syrup made from tree sap or honey from others for repackaging, and who do not combine syrup made from tree sap or honey with any other ingredients capable of supporting the growth of infectious or toxigenic organisms from certain licensing requirements for food processing establishments.
LawCode: Amd ยง251-z-3, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to exempting processors of syrup made from tree sap or honey from certain licensing requirements
